intro: Calyptrion arboreum, commonly known as the tree calyptrion, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Melanthiaceae. It is native to certain regions of South America, particularly in the Andean foothills. The plant is characterized by its tall, slender stems and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers.
